```{r setup}
library(faceup)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# make fake
make_fake(path = "~/Downloads", 
          n = 5, 
          loop = 5, 
          seed = 12345)

# make small
make_small(bigpath = "~/Downloads", 
           newpath = "~/Desktop")

# load list
mylist <- load_list(path = "~/Desktop")

# stack em
stacked <- long_stack(mylist)
```
